name: qr-code-generator
title: QR Code Generator
description: Generate QR codes from text or URLs
content:
Overview

This application generates QR codes from text or URLs. Built using the popular qrcode library, it creates high-quality scannable QR codes that can be used for sharing links, contact information, Wi-Fi credentials, and more.

Features

  • Generate QR codes from any text or URL
  • High-quality PNG output
  • Configurable size (default: 10 box size)
  • Error correction for reliable scanning

Parameters

  • Text/URL: Enter the text or URL to encode
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a QR code image named qr_code.png in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Sharing website URLs
  • Creating contact information cards
  • Generating Wi-Fi access codes
  • Event tickets and registration
  • Product information and tracking
command: rm -rf prod_apps && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python prod_apps/python/qr_code_generator.py "${text}" -o "${outputDir}" -s 10
